name: Dash fishing
description:
i know it isnt said anywhere in the game but

LMB - Reel (or Dash)

Esc - Quit

also not said anywhere, when you are dashing and have the fish on the hook, you can destroy enemies which is pretty much the only connection to the theme apart from the player also dying on one hit

if the game bugs out then just reset it, i have no idea why the bug happens but if it does then thats the only thing you can do lol
